data.objective: User should preffer to manage their expenses in NOVA instead of a spreadsheet

keyResults.title: User can do a CRUD of their expenses data manually
keyResults.instruction: Assisted test with 10 non technical users

keyResults.title: User can answer how much he has to pay in a certain month
keyResults.instruction: Assisted test with 10 non technical users

keyResults.title: User can automate to receive an email in the morning when he has any account to pay that day
keyResults.instruction: Assisted test with 10 non technical users

keyResults.title: NPS (Net Promoter Score) above 7 (0-10)
keyResults.instruction: All users shoudl respond a NPS survey answering how likely they are to refer NOVA for a friend
